name: Tag-Team Defense
description:
TAG-TEAM DEFENSE

made for Brackeys Jam  2021.1

You play a couple who need each other to survive the  wave of  attacks. Gather the materials from trees and stone and then build towers.

There is strength in numbers so help each other and speed up production time or the fire rate of towers by staying together. 

It is a super short game only one level. Enjoy

KEYBOARD Controls

Forager - WASD  = MOVE, X = ADD TO INVENTORY

Builder - ARROW KEYS = MOVE, X = BUILD TOWER
